Key Match Events: The James men became the first father and son to play together in NBA history in a preseason game against the Phoenix Suns.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James and the Lakers Coach JJ Redick were looking forward to the moment when LeBron and Bronny would play together in a game.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James was ecstatic over playing alongside his son Bronny for the first time professionally, calling it one of the most memorable moments of his storied NBA career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bronny James has struggled in his first two preseason games, but his father LeBron wants to be present in his life, especially after all the time they spent apart over the past two decades.
Others: The moment also highlighted the aspirations and values LeBron has in being a father, including having moments with his son and working with him.
